A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What the xxxx did disney do with Luke Skywalker? My Childhood hero turned into a bitter old man who is nothing like the Luke Skywalker of the original series.This film has disappointed me so much. Messy Story lines that don't really matter to the story\, a weak plot. Flat Characters\, and not very likable characters\, The acting is ok and on some parts good\, but the story is really lousy and not worthy of the name Star Wars. I have been a livelong fan of the franchise\, read a lot of the EU books seen all the movies numerous times. This movie breaks my heart and i get the feeling that that was just what Disney intended for. This movie feels like Evil propaganda.
